title: Allow to add more root nodes in element tree - feature request
author: vmario89
body_snippet:
Hi, at the current moment mRemoteNG only allows one local connection file in the connection tree which i can import/export/load ("Tools & Connection Stack" in my example):

![grafik](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5631071/38036493-1adea3f4-32a7-11e8-8ec4-48e6e31fa368.png)

Because i have different things in my mRemote i like to be able to change only partial things in my connection tree. I mean to **split** the folders and connections into different root nodes like this:
![grafik...

iterations.description: The request only says to allow more root nodes and does not define expected UI behavior, constraints, or save/load compatibility requirements.
The request is understandable but lacks concrete UX and persistence requirements for how multiple top-level roots should be created, displayed, and saved.
Multiple root nodes support improves connection organization and flexibility, addressing a user request and aligning with recent architectural updates.
Enabling multiple root nodes improves connection organization and flexibility for users.
